column4: has anyone had any problems with ubuntu freezing when playing a 3d game in full screen mode?
no...  what graphics driver are you using?
it happens with world of padman, assault cube, sauerbraten and it used to happen in nexius.
Are you using the ubuntu supplied driver?
or did you go and try Envy or something

it leaves fullscreen mode and becomes a window but the mouse and sometimes the keyboard are locked up.  i can ctrl+alt+f1-->top to kill it and everything is fine.... i installed the beta from the website.
Oh, I have seen that.  Turn off your screensaver
Your computer thinks it is idle
really!  that is amazing and wonderfully simple.  a thousand thank yous
then, when it is closing the game, it sees your mouse and jumps back
Just be sure to come back to #ubuntu and help someone else sometime.
